The Literary Stylometer API: Unlocking Textual Fingerprints

Indie developers, today's opportunity is at the nexus of AI, the API economy, and the timeless world of literature. Imagine a tool that can instantly dissect the unique stylistic signature of any written piece. That's the Literary Stylometer API.
